vista.app.schematic
Class DSMGridElement

java.lang.Object
  vista.graph.GraphicElement
      vista.app.schematic.DSMGridElement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, Animate, Bounded, Drawable
public class DSMGridElement
extends GraphicElement

The base class for all objects that need to be animated. This class has its update method called by the Animator class. This class implements setBounds and draw methods to render itself on the graphics context

drawThickLine

public final void drawThickLine(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                int x1,
                                int y1,
                                int x2,
                                int y2,
                                double t)
Simulates drawing of different thickness lines by using filled polygon.

Parameters:
g - Graphics on which to draw
x1 - The starting x co-ordinate of line
y1 - The starting y co-ordinate of line
x2 - The ending x co-ordinate of line
y2 - The ending y co-ordinate of line
t - The thickness of the line in pixels
